about_the_game:
Story

You play as the professional treasure hunter Jerome, who’s recently left the guild, because the other members benefited too much from your hard work and experience. You have finally realized that you are far better off working alone.
The scene takes place in an abandoned ancient dungeon. The word around town says the dungeon is haunted and without any details about the place, no one ever dared to set foot down there. Luckily you have managed to get hold of a map of the place.
After arriving at the ruin, your main goal is now to locate and grab an exceptional artifact. Unfortunately, others share the same goal as you

How to play

During gameplay, you are going to make some choices and sacrifices, which affects the outcome of how the game progresses. There’s no right and wrong.

The dungeon holds many clues about the dark past. You will find some interesting objects. Some objects are collectable and some are readable. The crosshair turns green, if you look at objects of interest.

Also, watch out for dangers such as traps, pits and enemies. You will die instantly if you aren’t observant. Luckily there’s several checkpoints across the dungeon.

name: Athemore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM DDR3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 / AMD Radeon™ HD 6870 (1GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 3 GB free space GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K @3.4 GHz / AMD FX-8350 @4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM DDR3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 3 GB free space MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible

short_description: Explore the underground ruins of Athemore and learn about the forgotten past. Will you make it out alive?
